document_data.mainbody:
Dimon was a cleric of Bane and the tharchion of Tyraturos in the realm of Thay in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Dimon was loyal to Szass Tam.
Dimon had fairer skin than most Mulan. Blue veins showed across his shaven head. He wore the black gauntlet emblematic of his order.
Around 1373 DR, Dimon decided to convert to the faith of Bane.
Dimon housed the council of zulkirs during the war of Thay in the . During one of their meetings, Dimon was attacked by the bored Nevron, who conjured an advespa to kill the priest. Suddenly, Bane took possession of his worshiper and endured the attack of the devil, in the end killing it with Dimons hands. Bane encouraged the zulkirs to fight Szass Tam again at the Keep of Sorrows under cover of the magic-crippling effect of the Spellplague. However, after the god disappeared, Dimon died from the wounds inflicted by the advespa.
